name: Torchic
hint: It totters around on unsteady feet.
It is covered in a fluffy coat of down.
It spits fireballs.
It is a Chick Pokémon.

name: Croconaw
hint: It opens its huge jaws wide when attacking.
There are 48 fangs lining its mouth.
Once it bites down, it won't let go until it loses its fangs.
It is a Big Jaw Pokémon.

name: Eevee
hint: It is very cute.
It has an unstable genetic makeup.
It appears to have the possibility of evolving into seven kinds of Pokémon.
It is an Evolution Pokémon.

name: Skarmory
hint: It is clad entirely in iron-hard armor.
It wheels through the sky at over 180 mph.
Its sharp feathers were used to make swords and knives.
It is an Armor Bird Pokémon.

name: Skitty
hint: It can't stop itself from chasing moving things.
It runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.
It usually lives in forests. Specifically, inside holes in trees.
It is a Kitten Pokémon.

name: Delcatty
hint: It does as it pleases at its own pace.
It eats and sleeps whenever and wherever it decides.
It is highly popular for its sublime fur.
It is a Prim Pokémon.

name: Empoleon
hint: It has a beak.
It swims as fast as a jet boat.
Three horns extend from its beak.
It is an Emperor Pokémon.

name: Feraligatr
hint: It is very large.
It usually moves slowly.
It bites with massive and powerful jaws.
It's a Big Jaw Pokémon.

name: Octillery
hint: It has a rock-hard head.
It has suction cups.
It spews murky ink from its mouth.
It is a Jet Pokémon.

name: Pinsir
hint: It has long pincers.
On cold nights, it sleeps under the ground.
It grips prey with its pincers.
It is a Stag Beetle Pokémon.

name: Hippowdon
hint: It can store sand in its body.
Its mouth is huge.
It blows sand from ports on its body to make a towering twister.
It is a Heavyweight Pokémon.

name: Snorlax
hint: It is very lazy.
It eats an enormous amount.
It goes to sleep as soon as it finishes eating.
It is a Sleeping Pokémon.

name: Wartortle
hint: It has a shell.
It swims.
It has furry ears and tail.
It is a Turtle Pokémon.

name: Blastoise
hint: It has a shell.
In a pinch, it withdraws into its shell.
It spouts water from rocket cannons on its shell.
It is a Shellfish Pokémon.

name: Treecko
hint: Its tail is thick.
The soles of its feet are covered by countless tiny spikes.
It can walk on walls and ceilings.
It is a Wood Gecko Pokémon.

name: Tauros
hint: It is always rampaging.
Once it takes aim, it charges with its horns.
They fight each other by locking horns.
It is a Wild Bull Pokémon.

name: Infernape
hint: It has a fiery nature.
It uses a special kind of martial arts.
It burns with a flame that never goes out.
It is a Flame Pokémon.

name: Whismur
hint: Its voice is normally very quiet.
If it senses danger, it starts crying at an earsplitting volume.
When it stops crying, it goes to sleep, all tired out.
It is a Whisper Pokémon.

name: Munchlax
hint: It swallows food whole with almost no chewing.
It hides food under its long body hair.
It forgets it has hidden food under its hair.
It is a Big Eater Pokémon.

name: Hitmonlee
hint: Its legs can stretch double in length.
It can kick in succession.
It can execute every known kick.
It is a Kicking Pokémon.

name: Zangoose
hint: It has sharp claws.
It has incredible agility.
It feuds with [CS:N]Seviper[CR].
It is a Cat Ferret Pokémon.

name: Sandslash
hint: It digs at an incredible pace.
It slashes foes with its claws.
It curls up its spike-covered back and tackles.
It is a Mouse Pokémon.

name: Sceptile
hint: It lovingly raises trees in its forest.
It agilely leaps about the branches of trees.
It has leaves growing on its body.
It is a Forest Pokémon.

name: Grovyle
hint: Its protective colors hide it in grass.
It moves extremely quickly.
It has sharp scythes on its forearms.
It is a Mantis Pokémon.

name: Squirtle
hint: It has a shell.
It swims.
It withdraws into its shell when endangered.
It is a Tiny Turtle Pokémon.

name: Shiftry
hint: It lives quietly deep in forests.
It can whip up powerful gusts of wind.
It holds large fans.
It is a Wicked Pokémon.

name: Shieldon
hint: Its facial hide is extremely hard.
It polishes its face by rubbing it against tree trunks.
It is weak to attacks from behind.
It is a Shield Pokémon.

name: Seedot
hint: The more water it drinks, the glossier its body becomes.
It attaches the top of its head to a branch, then dangles.
It looks just like an acorn when it is dangling from a branch of a tree.
It is an Acorn Pokémon.

name: Beldum
hint: Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic force circulates in its body.
To sleep, it anchors itself to a cliff using the hooks on its backside.
It uses magnetic waves to converse with its kind.
It is an Iron Ball Pokémon.

name: Chikorita
hint: It loves to sunbathe.
It can determine the temperature and humidity.
It has a leaf on its head.
It is a Leaf Pokémon.

name: Doduo
hint: It lives on a grassy plain with a clear field of vision.
Its fast running makes up for its poor flying.
It has two heads.
It is a Twin Bird Pokémon.

name: Togepi
hint: It is considered a symbol of good luck.
It has a shell.
Its shell is said to be filled with joy.
It is a Spike Ball Pokémon.

name: Torterra
hint: It migrates in search of water.
Its back is huge.
Small Pokémon make nests on its back.
It is a Continent Pokémon.

name: Turtwig
hint: The shell on its back is made of soil.
It photosynthesizes with its body, creating oxygen.
The leaf on its head wilts if it is thirsty.
It is a Tiny Leaf Pokémon.

name: Slakoth
hint: It loafs around motionlessly.
It is rarely seen in motion.
Seeing it is enough to make others drowsy.
It is a Slacker Pokémon.

name: Nidoqueen
hint: Its body is covered by stiff, needlelike scales.
Its hard scales provide strong protection.
It uses its tough, scaly body to seal its nest and protect its young.
It is a Drill Pokémon.

name: Meowth
hint: It loves anything that shines.
It is fascinated by round objects.
When it spots something shiny, the gold coin on its head shines too.
It is a Scratch Cat Pokémon.

name: Glameow
hint: It is very fickle.
It claws if it is displeased.
With its sharp glare, it puts foes into a mild hypnotic state.
It is a Catty Pokémon.

name: Politoed
hint: Whenever three or more get together, they start singing.
Its song sounds like bellowing.
Its echoing cry attracts [CS:N]Poliwag[CR] and [CS:N]Poliwhirl[CR].
It is a Frog Pokémon.

name: Marshtomp
hint: Its well-developed hind legs let it stand upright.
It plays in mud on beaches when the tide is out.
It burrows into dirt to sleep.
It is a Mud Fish Pokémon.

name: Camerupt
hint: It has humps on its back.
The humps are said to be transformed bones.
The humps sometimes erupt with lava.
It is an Eruption Pokémon.

name: Typhlosion
hint: It creates heat shimmers to hide itself.
The heat shimmers are created with intense fire.
It rubs its blazing fur together to cause explosions.
It is a Volcano Pokémon.

name: Blaziken
hint: It has incredibly strong legs.
It looses flames from its wrist when faced with a tough foe.
The tougher the foe, the more intensely its wrists burn.
It is a Blaze Pokémon.

name: Lombre
hint: It gets active after dusk.
Its body is covered by a slippery, slimy film.
It feels horribly unpleasant to be touched by its slimy hands.
It's a Jolly Pokémon.

name: Grotle
hint: It lives along water in forests.
It has a shell.
In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its tree-covered shell.
It is a Grove Pokémon.

name: Pikachu
hint: It looses electricity if it is endangered.
It stores electricity in the pouches on its cheeks.
It sometimes discharges electricity when it is dozy after waking up.
It is a Mouse Pokémon.

name: Chimchar
hint: It agilely scales steep cliffs.
Its rear end is on fire.
The fire on its rear end goes out when it sleeps.
It is a Chimp Pokémon.

name: Charmander
hint: It prefers hot things.
A flame burns at the tip of its tail.
Its tail burns intensely if it is healthy.
It is a Lizard Pokémon.

name: Cyndaquil
hint: It has a timid nature.
It shoots flames out of its back.
If it is startled, the flames on its back burn more vigorously.
It is a Fire Mouse Pokémon.

name: Ivysaur
hint: Exposure to sunlight makes it stronger.
It has a bud on its back.
When the bud begins to expand, it looses a sweet scent.
It's a Seed Pokémon.

name: Bulbasaur
hint: Its body grows in size with the seed.
There is a seed on its back.
It grows by drawing nutrients from the seed on its back for a short while after hatching.
It is a Seed Pokémon.

name: Venusaur
hint: Exposure to sunlight fills it with energy.
There is a flower growing on its back.
After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger.
It is a Seed Pokémon.

name: Bayleef
hint: There is a leaf on its head.
Its neck is ringed by buds.
The buds give off a spicy aroma.
It is a Leaf Pokémon.

name: Heracross
hint: It gathers in forests to search for tree sap, its favorite food.
It is extremely strong.
It flings foes using its strength and mighty horn.
It is a Single Horn Pokémon.

name: Persian
hint: It has a vicious temperament.
Its fur has many admirers.
It has a gem on its forehead.
It is a Classy Cat Pokémon.

name: Hoothoot
hint: It begins hooting at precisely the same time every day.
It always stands on one foot.
It switches its standing foot so quickly, it can't be seen.
It is an Owl Pokémon.

name: Poochyena
hint: It has a persistent nature.
At first sight, it takes a bite out of anything that moves.
A distinguishing feature is how large its fangs are compared to its body.
It is a Bite Pokémon.

name: Prinplup
hint: It lives alone, away from others.
Its wings deliver wicked blows.
It searches for prey in icy seas.
It is a Penguin Pokémon.

name: Piplup
hint: Its thick down guards it from cold.
It lives along shores in northern countries.
It is a skilled swimmer.
It is a Penguin Pokémon.

name: Pidgey
hint: It lives among tall grasses and in forests.
It chases off foes by flapping up sand.
It is docile, but it can strike back ferociously.
It is a Tiny Bird Pokémon.

name: Ponyta
hint: It is very weak at birth. It can barely walk.
Its hooves are extremely hard.
Its mane is made of fire.
It is a Fire Horse Pokémon.

name: Porygon
hint: It is programmed with only basic motions.
It can't perform motions that have not been programmed.
It is capable of moving freely in cyberspace.
It is a Virtual Pokémon.

name: Quilava
hint: It is fully covered by nonflammable fur.
It keeps foes at bay with intense flames.
It attacks with the fire on its back.
It is a Volcano Pokémon.

name: Bellsprout
hint: Its body is very skinny.
It prefers hot and humid places.
It plants its feet deep underground to replenish water.
It is a Flower Pokémon.

name: Mudkip
hint: It has a fin on its head.
In water, it breathes using the gills on its cheeks.
It has the strength to heft boulders.
It is a Mud Fish Pokémon.

name: Meganium
hint: Being close to it is refreshing, as if relaxing in a sunny forest.
It has flower petals around its neck.
Its breath can revive dead plants and flowers.
It is an Herb Pokémon.

name: Monferno
hint: It uses ceilings and walls to launch aerial attacks.
Its fiery tail is only one of its weapons.
It stretches the fire on its tail to make itself appear bigger.
It is a Playful Pokémon.

name: Murkrow
hint: It hides any shiny object it finds in a secret location.
It is said to be the bearer of ill fortune.
It is believed to bring misfortune to those who see it at night.
It is a Darkness Pokémon.

name: Vigoroth
hint: It is always itching to go on a wild rampage.
It is simply incapable of remaining still.
Its stress level rises if it can't be moving constantly.
It is a Wild Monkey Pokémon.

name: Raichu
hint: It turns aggressive if it has too much electricity charged in its electric pouches.
It has electric pouches in its cheeks.
It discharges electricity by planting its tail in the ground.
It is a Mouse Pokémon.

name: Swampert
hint: It predicts storms by sensing changes in the sounds of waves and tidal winds with its fins.
It protects its nest from storms by piling up boulders.
With one swing of its thick arm, it can batter down its foe.
It is a Mud Fish Pokémon.

name: Charmeleon
hint: It has vicious claws.
The tip of its tail is burning.
If it becomes agitated in battle, the flame on its tail burns more intensely.
It is a Flame Pokémon.

name: Charizard
hint: Its fire burns hotter if it has experienced harsh battles.
It flies high on its wings.
When breathing intense fire, the tip of its tail also flares ferociously.
It is a Flame Pokémon.

name: Ledyba
hint: It is very timid and swarms with others right away.
In cold weather, they cluster to keep each other warm.
It secretes an aromatic fluid from its leg to indicate its location.
It is a Five Star Pokémon.

name: Combusken
hint: It toughens up its legs by running through fields and mountains.
It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.
It battles with intense fire and outstandingly destructive kicks.
It is a Young Fowl Pokémon.

name: Totodile
hint: It is small, but rough and tough.
Its well-developed jaws are powerful and capable of crushing anything.
It has the habit of biting anything.
It is a Big Jaw Pokémon.

name: Starly
hint: It flocks in great numbers.
Though small, it flaps its wings with great power.
Its cries are very strident.
It is a Starling Pokémon.

name: Ninetales
hint: It is very intelligent and persistent.
It is said to live for a thousand years.
It has nine tails.
It is a Fox Pokémon.

name: Absol
hint: It is said to live in mountainous areas.
It rarely travels to the base of mountains.
It appears before people only to warn them of impending danger.
It is a Disaster Pokémon.

name: Phanpy
hint: It is strong despite its compact size.
It likes to dig holes in riverbanks.
It uses its long nose to shower itself.
It is a Long Nose Pokémon.

name: Shinx
hint: Its body shines if endangered.
Its forelegs have a muscle-based system of generating electricity.
Its fur dazzles when in danger, and it flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.
It is a Flash Pokémon.

name: Rhyhorn
hint: Its body is clad in a thick hide.
Its bones are said to be very strong and solid.
Once it starts charging, it won't stop until it falls asleep.
It is a Spikes Pokémon.

name: Vibrava
hint: It violently shudders its wings, generating ultrasonic waves.
Its ultrasonic waves can make enemies faint.
Its ultrasonic waves are so strong they can induce headaches.
It is a Vibration Pokémon.

name: Trapinch
hint: It makes a pit in desert sand and waits at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.
Its large jaw is strong enough to crush rocks.
It can go up to a week without water.
It is an Ant Pit Pokémon.

name: Electrike
hint: It stores electricity in its fur.
It stimulates its muscles using electricity to heighten its reaction speed.
It runs so fast it is merely a blur.
It is a Lightning Pokémon.

name: Ninjask
hint: It moves very quickly.
It moves so fast that it cannot be seen.
It congregates around tree sap.
It is a Ninja Pokémon.

name: Donphan
hint: It has very large, long tusks.
Its body is clad in a thick hide.
It attacks by curling up, then rolling into its foe.
It is an Armor Pokémon.

name: Spinda
hint: It spins around when it walks.
Its erratic step fouls the aim of foes.
It has spots.
It is a Spot Panda Pokémon.

name: Breloom
hint: It uses fancy footwork to get close to enemies.
Its arms stretch when it throws punches.
The seeds on its tail are made of hard-packed poison.
It is a Mushroom Pokémon.

name: Linoone
hint: It can run very quickly to charge enemies.
It's very difficult for it to take even the slightest curve.
If it doesn't stop quickly, it cannot turn.
It is a Rushing Pokémon.

name: Hitmontop
hint: It fights while spinning like a top.
It spins on its head to time its attacks against enemies.
It kicks while spinning.
It is a Handstand Pokémon.

name: Mankey
hint: It is said to live in treetop colonies.
It's always angry.
If one becomes enraged, the whole colony rampages for no reason.
It is a Pig Monkey Pokémon.

name: Riolu
hint: Its body is lithe yet powerful.
It is said to be able to crest three mountains and cross two canyons in one night.
It emanates an aura from its body.
It is an Emanation Pokémon.

name: Lucario
hint: It has the ability to sense auras.
It is a Fighting- and Steel-type Pokémon.
It can read others' thoughts and movements from their auras.
It is an Aura Pokémon.

name: Luxio
hint: Its claws loose electricity with enough voltage to cause fainting.
They live in small groups.
It communicates with rhythmic electric pulses from its claws.
It is a Spark Pokémon.

name: Luxray
hint: Its eyes gleam gold.
It has eyes that can see through anything.
It spots and captures prey hiding behind objects.
It is a Gleam Eyes Pokémon.

name: Vulpix
hint: It controls balls of fire.
It has six tails.
As it grows, its six tails split from their tips to make more tails.
It is a Fox Pokémon.

name: Gallade
hint: It is a master of courtesy.
It fights using extending swords on its elbows.
It is a master of swordsmanship.
It is a Blade Pokémon.

name: Wynaut
hint: It is always smiling.
It loves eating sweet fruit.
It grows strong by pushing up against others as part of a group.
It is a Bright Pokémon.

name: Nidoking
hint: Its large limbs and tail boast of its intense strength.
Its skin is as hard as a rock, and it has a long horn.
Its horn is poisonous.
It is a Drill Pokémon.
